# DateTime

A DateTime-Picker.

Example

[
    'id' => 'date',
    'type' => 'dt',
    'formatted' => 'l',
    'title' => 'Date',
    'placeholder' => 'Date',
    'hint' => 'Chose a date',
    'width' => 12
],

# Formats

key Format
LT 2:15 PM
LTS 2:15:52 PM
L 12/08/2019
l 12/8/2019
LL December 8, 2019
ll Dec 8, 2019
LLL December 8, 2019 2:15 PM
lll Dec 8, 2019 2:15 PM
LLLL Sunday, December 8, 2019 2:15 PM
llll Sun, Dec 8, 2019 2:15 PM
Edit this page
